modName: HXPs Texutre Set - Choice of Light -HD
summary: High Quality Textures - Choice of Light
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/p0mJ2nKl.jpg[/IMG]

[youtube]7OQB7bk7HkI[/youtube]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bV77PuUl.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DEmBIvfl.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LdkTWHFl.jpg[/IMG]

Ok so after working a little bit more on some Textures I will now Release another Texture Pack HD for Skyrim.

This Texture pack contains: 2048x2048 + 1024x1024 mixed Textures

-First of all I\'d like to say - All Textures will give a more Deep 3D look to everything you will see as soon as you start your Game !!!

-The complete Blacksmith Forge in a New Version all HD (some of you maybe know my Design Blacksmithing HD Mod)
-The Design Blacksmithing HD Mod is now Outdated and will not be updated anymore and has moved to this Mods Section

-So lets Start what has all been Changed:

-Blacksmith Hammer
-Blacksmith Tonge
-Blacksmith Anvil
-Blacksmith Bellow
-Blacksmith Forge the Stones around the Forge
-Blacksmith Workbench
-Blacksmith Workbenchtop
-Blacksmith Grindstone
-Blacksmith Sharpening Wheel Woods
-Blacksmith Water (horsetrough)

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2rUZ3htl.jpg[/IMG]

-New Smelter HD

-New HD Textures for The Bark (Tree)

-New HD Ropes

-New HD Stonewalls

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6B6Grt2l.jpg[/IMG]

-New Nightsky HD with New Skyrimgalaxy HD

-Added more Blinking Skystars HD

-New Woodplanks HD for Houses (fresh and clean cut)

-New Chopping Woodblock HD

-New Firewood HD with better 3D Effect

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5Ec6Pyjl.jpg[/IMG]

-New Tanning Rack Woods HD

-New Wood also for some Tables

Also take a look at Screenshots and Watch the Video for further Details !

There were many Requests and Suggestions from my Previous Mods to add and to change some Textures.
I often heared to make more brighter Textures or Brighter Wood. So this is why the Mod is called the Choice of Light because it is Bright !
I will still work on this Mod and even add some more Textures to it from time to time.The Next Release I know for Sure now will be more darker.


Like Always you can support this Mod with your Endorsment if you like it !


Feel free to comment and add your Own Screenshots and Suggestions or Requests.

I also know that not everyone is going to like this Texure Pack, but hey thats Life. Everybody has a different Taste. A lot of People even dont like the Vanilla Skyrim.
I also know that some of you dont like this too Realistic looking Textures but I like the Photographic Realistic look a lot,Thats where the more Deep 3D effect comes from.
Next Release I will also try to make it more Gamefriendly if it is not already now.

Installation:
Only Manual Install = Simply drop the Data Folder into your Skyrim Main Directory and Overwrite all Files to make sure this Mod works correctly !
To make this Mod Compatible with Skyrim Flora Overhaul and SMIM firts Install them and then at last my Mod and Overwrite all the Files!
If you are using Skyrim HD Install it First and then again Overwrite Files of it with my Mod !


Credits to Nexus and Bethesda

Credits to Tammy Sue and Ncrow for some Wood Texture

Credits to all Texture makers in the World

All Textures were free to use and were found in Google Pics and modified by me only

Enjoy

HXP[/center]
author: HXP
